About Me

Hello! I’m Dhiru Kumar, a passionate full-stack developer currently in my second year at Ramanujan College, Delhi University.

My expertise lies in MERN Stack, along with Next.js, TypeScript, and AWS. I have built projects like a Paytm Clone with features like secure authentication (JWT), dynamic transactions, and API integration.

I am passionate about cloud computing and exploring AWS services like EC2 and S3. My goal is to become one of the best full-stack developers by continuously learning and building scalable applications.

Apart from coding, I love singing, which keeps me creative and motivated!
